definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The condition of the people was one of local self-sufficiency, and local customs displaced formal law.
sentences.chinese: 人們自給自足地生活，用地方慣例代替正規法律。

sentences.english: Unascertained normal subgroup is also studied.
sentences.chinese: 並且研究了未確知正規子羣。

sentences.english: Generally, a linear least squares problem leads to ihc solution of the so called normal equation.
sentences.chinese: 解線性最小二乘問題時，通常都要解所謂正規方程。

sentences.english: Formal training programs and military doctrine also got good marks.
sentences.chinese: 正規訓練和軍事操典項也得高分。

sentences.english: We are good at deal with problems on normality of subgroups and formation theory.
sentences.chinese: 在正規性理論，羣系理論等問題有教深入的研究。

sentences.english: Letterbox Direct said it had followed all the correct procedures.
sentences.chinese: “直達信箱”表示它遵循了所有的正規程序。

sentences.english: Cameroon Ministry of Communications has also ordered three companies of informal long-distance passenger business for rectification.
sentences.chinese: 喀交通部還勒令三家非正規長途客運公司停業整頓。

sentences.english: Your passport must be a regular, private passport.
sentences.chinese: 你的護照必須是正規的，私人護照。

sentences.english: Although he had had little formal education, he could read and write well.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他接受很少正規教育，但他的讀寫能力佷好。

sentences.english: California Penal Code 488 - small fine, community service, restitution and 3 years of informal probation.
sentences.chinese: 小額罰款，社區服務，賠償，及3年非正規緩刑。

sentences.english: Especially, people pay much attention to those normal subgroup.
sentences.chinese: 這些子羣中，人們特別關注那些正規的同餘子羣。

sentences.english: Banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies - Thomas Jefferson
sentences.chinese: 銀行機構比正規軍隊更加危險。

sentences.english: Regular salaried or wage-paying jobs are scarce in many developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 在許多發展中國家，正規的付薪工作很少。

sentences.english: Such as quenching and tempering treatment manufacturers want to make regular, and there is a written report.
sentences.chinese: 如調質處理要到正規廠家做，並有書面報告。

sentences.english: RKHS will be an essential tool for establishing a connection between Regularization Theory and Statistical Learning Theory.
sentences.chinese: RKHS是結合正規化理論和統計學理論的必要工具。

sentences.english: Therefore, I have not received proper English education before.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我也從來沒有接受過正規的英語教育。
